document.description: Chipotle is rated the healthiest fast food restaurant in the ... to customize your meal as they make each order ... I like I can have a beer with my food. Recommended.

Home > United States > Colorado (CO) > El Paso County > Colorado Springs > Colorado Springs Restaurants > Chipotle Mexican Grill
All 755 Colorado Springs Restaurants» Chipotle Mexican Grill 7818 N Academy Blvd , Colorado Springs , CO 80920-3920 719-531-6801 Website Menu Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #71 of 755 restaurants in Colorado Springs 17 Reviews Price range: $5 - $10 Cuisines: Mexican Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 17 reviews from our community 88% Recommend Excellent 8 Very good 7 Average 1 Poor 0 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 17 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any dlanor Colorado Top Contributor 73 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 18 helpful votes “Very Good Food” Reviewed June 26, 2012 A relatively new chain serving food better than most chains. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 44 more reviews by dlanor for Colorado Springs Heidi_25_55 Nebraska Senior Reviewer 6 reviews Reviews in 5 cities 3 helpful votes “Love Chipotle!” Reviewed June 14, 2012 Wish this resturant would come up to northern Nebraska! Healthy and yummy! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Scott H Brea, California Top Contributor 51 reviews Reviews in 26 cities 4 helpful votes “always fresh and tasty” Reviewed June 6, 2012 Enjoyed my burrito like always. A bit more generous here then in my home town Chipotle of So Cal. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? SDCathy SD Senior Contributor 24 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 11 helpful votes “Blazing fast and delicious.” Reviewed June 4, 2012 We like Chipotle and have enjoyed them in several cities, including this one in Colorado Springs. The servings are generously sized. Each person in our family can get things that taste the way they want them to. And it's a great value for freshly made food with fresh ingredients. And the guacamole - the best! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 9 more reviews by SDCathy for Colorado Springs tessa681 Colorado Springs, CO Senior Contributor 45 reviews Reviews in 4 cities 7 helpful votes “Fast and Yummy” Reviewed March 19, 2012 Great fast mexican type food! Get in and out in a hurry, HUGE portions! Chips and Guac are AWESOME! For the calorie counter you can get it in a bowl! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 40 more reviews by tessa681 for Colorado Springs Kimmy B Tampa, Florida Contributor 18 reviews Reviews in 3 cities 6 helpful votes “RICE&Cilantro overkill!” Reviewed January 12, 2012 I do not like the tastes here! I like my tacos/burritos with more meat, less rice.. less cilantro. It seems the cilantro overpowers all the other flavors. If I want that much rice, I'll eat sushi. My husband does like this place (but he's not writing the review.. I am).. so I was forced in here again.. I ordered a... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 9 more reviews by Kimmy B for Colorado Springs Amanda H Kogarah, Australia Top Contributor 65 reviews Reviews in 10 cities 7 helpful votes “Quick and Tasty” Reviewed January 9, 2012 Quick and tasty. Easy menu at a fair price - I eat here as often as I can. Good food - healthy alternative to traditional food. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 37 more reviews by Amanda H for Colorado Springs Devin R Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States Top Contributor 51 reviews 7 helpful votes “Just love this place!!” Reviewed January 6, 2012 Well here is for your confidence. Chipotle is rated the healthiest fast food restaurant in the world. Then in Colorado (since it originated here) we get the honor of having all natural ingredients...most of which come from here in Colorado. I just get a burrito with everything on it and devour it. The downside is that no more student drink... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 50 more reviews by Devin R for Colorado Springs ScottandJanelle Colorado Springs, Colorado Top Contributor 63 reviews Reviews in 23 cities 28 helpful votes “In a league of their own” Reviewed December 28, 2011 Chipotle is a favorite spot for everyone in my family and for good reason. The burritos are amazingly delicious and will not leave you hungry. You get to customize your meal as they make each order fresh and in front of you; everyone gets to have their food exactly as they desire. Chipotle pride themselves in serving good food from... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 12 more reviews by ScottandJanelle for Colorado Springs mcjardine British Columbia Senior Contributor 25 reviews Reviews in 14 cities 13 helpful votes “neat new style of fast foods for me” Reviewed November 30, 2011 love it , can't get enough of this mexican fast food. Healthy alternative . I need to learn a whole new language for ordering . I slowed the line down considerably ,but staff was so patient Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
